name: Dave and Gorbachev
description:
A simple puzzle game where you control Dave and Gorbachev to reach the bottom of the temple. There are a few set of weight related rules that you might had to figure out

Press R to restart

Intended for 1 player, but you could just try to play it with your friend if you want.

My submission for Trijam #73 with theme tiny people. Saying it's following the theme might be a bit forced. im just wake up in the morning and like "oh yeah, David and Goliath, that might worked"xd

No offense for Soyúz Sovétskikh Sotsialistícheskikh Respúblik-an, Russian, and Christian XD

It kinda rushed so i didn't have much to show at the end of the game, even the character still a placeholder lol.
